channel.title: Run Server.bat on a Mac
channel.description: I run Mac OS X 10.4.11, and whenever I click Run Server.bat in my source, it just opens up a Microsoft Word document that lets me edit code, which i don't want to do. How do I fix this?

item.title: Run Server.bat on a Mac
item.dc:creator: @Jellybean732 Jellybean732
item.description:
@Jellybean732 wrote:

well, .bat is a file extension recognised by the windows command prompt, you need to use terminal or another command-line progam to open ur server or run parallels/vmware fusion

Read full topic
